name: Arise
description:
A simple platformer with a twist: invert gravity to navigate the twisting tunnels beneath the mystical mountain.  

  • Tight platforming that's difficult but fair
  • Puzzling levels that make you think to find your way
  • Minimal pixel art and old-school chiptunes

This is the very first version of a bigger game in development. More updates to follow. Let me know what you think in the comments! (I'm looking for a better title). Thanks for any and all support  :)
